name: Hard Movie Quotes: The 80s, Part 2 Quiz / Test | Which Movie - Very Difficult | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
Ghostbusters.

	This is Egon Spengler's (Harold Ramis) response to Janine (Annie Potts) when she suspects aloud that he 'reads a lot'.

questions.text: 'If I find out you're lyin' to me, I'm gonna come back and kill you in your own kitchen.'
questions.explanation:
Above the Law.

	Nico Toscani (Steven Seagal) uses this threat on a small-time Chicago crimelord.

questions.text: 'With a flaccid penis, it's the number of folds that counts.'
questions.explanation:
Lucas.

	Lucas Bly (Corey Haim) uses his knowledge of biology to defend himself against disparaging remarks made by football players in the locker room.

questions.text: 'Of course you're confused -- you're wearing my underwear.'
questions.explanation:
Just One of the Guys.

	Terry (Joyce Hyser) has embarked upon a mission to pass herself off as a boy at a new school in order to write an award-winning article. This line, spoken by her brother Buddy (Billy Jayne) addresses Terry's general confusion after she falls in love with a boy at said school.

questions.text: 'If you overcook it, it's no good. It defeats its own purpose.'
questions.explanation:
Raging Bull.

	Jake La Motta (Robert De Niro) provides unwelcome commentary as his wife Vickie (Cathy Moriarty) prepares a steak for him.

questions.text: 'Great. I'm about to be killed a million miles from nowhere with some gung-ho iguana who tells me to relax!'
questions.explanation:
The Last Starfighter.

	Alex Rogan (Lance Guest) complains about the fact that his reptilian compatriot Grig (Dan O'Herlihy) doesn't seem to share his apprehension about being aboard the sole fighter craft destined to take on numerous enemy forces.

The Blues Brothers & Blues Brothers.

	Spoken just before Jake (John Belushi) and Elwood (Dan Aykroyd) disrupt a neo-Nazi demonstration on a bridge in a Chicago suburb.

St. Elmo's Fire

	Inebriated saxophone player Billy Sixx (Rob Lowe) asks this of a female fan as he is being loaded into an ambulance.

questions.correct: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
options: Star Trek III: The Search For Spock
Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
questions.explanation:
Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan.

	Khan Noonien Singh (Ricardo Montalban), who has illegally commandeered the USS RELIANT, responds to his subordinate after having received standard hailing frequencies from the unsuspecting USS ENTERPRISE.

questions.text: 'I would kill or die to make love to you.'
questions.explanation:
Gotcha!.

	Jonathan (Anthony Edwards) has been advised by his best friend to use this line on the first beautiful woman he meets in Germany. He does so, which gets him into more trouble than he bargained for with CIA operative Cheryl Brewster (a.k.a. Sasha Banniczek, played by Linda Fiorentino).

questions.text: 'Is that you, John Wayne? Is this me?'
questions.explanation:
Full Metal Jacket.

	Stanley Kubrick's Vietnam epic. The line in question is spoken by Private Joker (Matthew Modine) as a response to the overblown machismo of Sgt. Hartman (R. Lee Ermey).

questions.text: 'All they wanna do is stay indoors, smoke cigarettes, and relate. I don't like 'em.'
questions.explanation:
The Sure Thing.

	Walter 'Gib' Gibson (John Cusack) explains to his buddy why he's not especially fond of the women who attend the co-ed mixers at their college. Said buddy's response? 'Why do you have to *like* 'em?'

questions.text: 'If I'd been any kind of a leader, I would've told you guys this stuff a long time ago. Instead, I was tellin' you basketball stories.'
questions.explanation:
Gung Ho.

	Hunt Stevenson (Michael Keaton) finally admits to the denizens of Hadleyville that he's been lying to them for quite some time about the details of his agreement with the Japanese owners of Assan Motors.

Jumpin' Jack Flash.

	This is the critical, encrypted message sent by super-spy Jack (Johnathan Pryce) to bank teller Terry (Whoopi Goldberg) via their computer-enabled communications arrangement.

questions.text: 'Do you know how stupid he is? He thinks that the Gettysburg Address is where Lincoln lived.'
questions.explanation:
A Fish Called Wanda.

	Wanda (Jamie Lee Curtis) is describing Otto (Kevin Kline), who *hates* being called stupid.
